content: The National Pension System NPS, previously known as National Pension Scheme, is an investment instrument offered by the Central Government.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: The Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority PFRDA regulates the NPS, ensuring maximum security.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: You may invest in NPS regularly during your working years and create substantial wealth for retirement.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: Once you retire, a portion of the accumulated maturity amount will become available for withdrawal.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: You can benefit from this pension scheme if you are a government, private or unorganized sector employee.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: But, before investing in NPS, you must learn how the scheme works.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: The benefits of NPS NPS has become a popular investment avenue over the last few years due to its substantial returns and security.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: The scheme offers many other benefits that make it a suitable investment option for everyone.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: High returns When investing to build a retirement fund, your focus should be to earn high returns.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: And NPS can offer that as it has historically provided 8 to 10 annual interest for more than a decade.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: When you invest in NPS, the fund managers put a portion of the money in equity-based investment options.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: That is how NPS generates higher returns than most other tax-saving schemes.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: Additionally, if you are not satisfied with the returns, the scheme allows you to change the fund manager as well.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: Stabilized risk Equity-linked investment products are generally risky as market volatility can affect their returns.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: But NPS is a safe option as the scheme systematically stabilizes the risk.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: If you are a government employee, NPS allows you to invest only up to 50 of your total fund in equities.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: After you reach 50 years, the schemes equity exposure automatically starts to reduce by 2.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: If you are 60 years or more, the equity exposure limit will become fixed at 50.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: This systematic stabilization balances risk and returns, ensuring that your money is safe.

content: If all these seem too complicated, you can use a National Pension Scheme calculator.

content: Tax benefits One benefit of NPS that makes it lucrative is the tax deductions it offers.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: The contributions you and your employer make towards NPS are tax-deductible up to 1.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: The self-contributed amount is tax exemptible under subsection 80CCD 1 of Section 80C of the Income Tax Act, 1961.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: The tax benefit for the employers contribution is covered under Section 80CCD 2.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: If you are self-employed, the tax deduction limit is 20 of your gross income under subsection 80CCD 1.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: But you will not get any exemption under Section 80CCD 2.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: Under Section 80CCD 2, the tax deduction limit is whichever is the lowest from the following.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: Employers NPS contribution Total gross income 10 of basic pay and Dearness Allowance DA Additionally, Section 80CCD 1B allows a tax deduction of up to 50,000 on your contribution to the NPS account.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: So, you can get a total tax exemption of up to 2 lakhs using the benefits offered by Sections 80CCD 1 and 80CCD 1B.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: Emergency withdrawal You may withdraw up to 60 of your accumulated NPS fund after the age of 60 years.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: You will get the remaining amount as pension paid on a regular basis from an insurance firm registered under PFRDA.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: It is always advisable to stay invested in the NPS until you retire, allowing your money to grow into significant wealth.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: But NPS allows you to withdraw up to 25 of the fund for emergency purposes after staying invested for at least three years.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: The reasons for withdrawal can be medical treatment for yourself or your family, buying or building a house, higher education or wedding of children, and other purposes.

title: NPS Calculator Online for National Pension Scheme - Jupiter
content: You can withdraw the money three times during the investment tenure with a minimum gap of five years between each withdrawal.

content: Components of Your Salary Slip In every professional field, employees get paid at the end of the month by their employers.

content: The amount they receive is usually mentioned in their contract as well as the pay slip.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: The salary has many components that may vary among different employers.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: Below is a list of the most common breakdown of the salary structure.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: Basic salary It is a part of the Cost to Company CTC that the employers pay to the employees for their services.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: The basic salary is generally around 40 to 50 of your total salary.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: It depends on factors like the industry, employee designation, and much more.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: House Rent Allowance HRA Companies pay the HRA to employees who stay in a rented property.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: The HRA amount equals 50 of the basic salary if you live in metro cities. For the non-metro cities, the amount is 40 of your basic salary.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: Section 10 13A of the Income Tax Act, 1961 makes the HRA partially or fully tax exemptible.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: But, if you do not stay in a rented property, the entire component is taxable.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: Leave Travel Allowance LTA Employers pay this benefit for you and your familys domestic travel expenses during a holiday.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: Section 105 of the Income Tax Act, 1961 offers tax exemption on the LTA amount for up to two holidays in a four-calendar-year block.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: You need to submit proof of travel to receive the tax benefit.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: Special Allowance This is a fixed amount your employer may pay above your basic salary.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: The Special Allowance varies among companies as it depends on multiple factors.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: Bonus Bonus is a component of the gross salary that the employers may pay as a performance encouragement.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: Employee Provident Fund EPF It is generally a mandatory savings scheme.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary
content: You need to pay 12 of your basic salary as an EPF contribution.

title: In Hand Salary Calculator - Calculate Take Home Salary

title: Credit Card EMI Calculator with GST
content: A Credit Card EMI allows users to convert a large purchase made with a credit card into smaller, more manageable monthly installments.

title: Credit Card EMI Calculator with GST
content: Instead of paying the full amount at once, you can chose to repay the amount in parts.

title: Credit Card EMI Calculator with GST
content: Your bank will provide the feature to pay the amount back over a predefined tenure with applicable interest rate.

title: Credit Card EMI Calculator with GST
content: What is a Credit Card EMI Calculator? A Credit Card EMI Calculator is a tool that helps you figure out how much you will pay each month if you convert a large purchase on your credit card into EMIs Equated Monthly Installments.

title: Credit Card EMI Calculator with GST
content: How it works When you buy a product like a laptop, phone or an appliance you dont always have to pay the full amount upfront.

title: Credit Card EMI Calculator with GST
content: With EMI, you can break the total cost into smaller monthly payments over a set period.

title: Credit Card EMI Calculator with GST
content: However, the bank charges interest on this amount, which increases the total amount youll pay, but helps you pay the smaller amount at the time of purchase.

title: Credit Card EMI Calculator with GST
content: Here are some of the terms that you will come across Principal Amount P  The total purchase amount converted to EMI.

title: Credit Card EMI Calculator with GST
content: Interest Rate r  Annual or monthly interest rate charged on the EMI.

title: Credit Card EMI Calculator with GST
content: Tenure n  The duration in months over which the EMI is paid.

title: Credit Card EMI Calculator with GST
